name: Mali(demo)
description:
puzzle and adventure point-and-click  game, The product is demo.  

If you will try this game, thank you a lot! This is so important to me.

I'm looking forward to get your feedback. Please, get in touch!

https://www.facebook.com/Genaticstudio/

Install instructions

Thank you for your support 

Note that the .zip and the .rar format are both the same game. You will only need to download one of them. 

Please extract every single element you find in the .zip/.rar into one folder. You should now be able to play the .exe 'mali'.
